channel.title: I have a server on a vps need a coder/hoster to help i have no time
channel.description: i have a server online dedi 24/7 with a vps..i have atleast 20-30 peeps on all the time and growing fast,,I work 12 hour days and cant do all the codeing myself.theres always something to add or fix and i just cant get the time to do it all..I need someone that is good..NO JOKES ABOUT CODEING!!!.If u cant code urself dont bother my players dont deserve some copy and paste noob..So if u can code useing java instead of copy and paste and know ur stuff about codeing then send me a message on here or on yahoo messenger my name on messenger is mr_nice_guy446 and my emial is mr_nice_guy446@yahoo.com.I will not say my server name or my server website..Advertizeing isnt allowed here..I dont know if i am supposed to post this here or not but i figured this is the closest subject..Sry if i am not supposed to post this here..If im not supposed plz have a mod contact me or reply on here and i will remove it.

item.title: I have a server on a vps need a coder/hoster to help i have no time
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Destiny Pure Destiny
item.description:
@Pure_Destiny wrote:

[quote=“P.o.w.e.r, post:4, topic:265715”][quote author=i8u2x2002 link=topic=350810.msg2694296#msg2694296 date=1236153837]
listen up. im not some little punk kid. im 27 yrs old.and i will also be codeing myself i just cant do it all.I pay for the danm website and for the vps.So yea I do contribute alot to the server.And as i siad im not looking for someone to do all the work theres just times i cant get to something that someone might suggest to do or if mods/admins need help and the only way to help is to edite the server in some way through the vps which mods and admins cant connect to.So no im not looking to just hand over all the work and take credit for it.I just need some frigin help at times when its to much to do for me.
[/quote]
Ok I aint no punk kid bro, im 22[/quote]
Umm?

Age: 25

In your profile?

And yeah you’re also right. If you need someone to code and host a server for you, what are you going to do? Sit around and whatever tell everyone your owner, why the hell would someone host a server for you to be owner on and them to be Administrator or Co-Owner.

By the way, you got a VPS but you need a hoster?

Read full topic
item.source: I have a server on a vps need a coder/hoster to help i have no time

item.title: I have a server on a vps need a coder/hoster to help i have no time
item.dc:creator: @P.o.w.e.r P.o.w.e.r
item.description:
@P.o.w.e.r wrote:

Ok I aint no punk kid bro, im 22 and idk how you could not have the time to set a server up. It took me 2h this morning to make mine…configure and all. if you cant even spend 2h to make the server it might not even be worth makeing it?

Read full topic

why do you one someone to code and host? what are you actuely going to do? the answer is NOTHING so if your gana ask for someone to open a server so you can be owner…thats just fing sad
